lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Although the market is expected to be resting until trading switches to an April value date, the euroyen sector is expected to be buoyed by some professional switching out of Japanese government bonds into relatively cheaper euroyen bonds.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Given the potential volatility of this market -- one which has been conclusively proved by the events of the last days -- senior management are now duty bound to revise the set of parameters within which they, as market makers, are now to work," commented one senior source at a leading U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Despite some late signs that prices were recovering last week, today's erratic trade provided a similarly mixed final picture with longer-dated FRNs still clearly under pressure.
